bio: Aging hipster wannabe, writes too much; edits to little, immature, overly passionate, trying way too hard to be funnier than he is. http://about.me/jonjohns Missouri Southern State College Carthage High School McAuley Regional Hgh School St. Ann's, St. Anthony's O'Reilly Media Community Engagemnt Specialist Starbucks Coffee Company Store Manager Broderbund Mindscape SSI Beta Test Manager Mattel Softkey Nacio Lasercraft MaZ00's Subway Taco Bell Ben Franklin 5-10 O'Reilly Media (Not Bill, TIM)
